Class PuzzleModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.puzzle.PuzzleModel
  • public class PuzzleModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Yaroslav Bilodid, Marc Hegedus, Jesse Desmarais

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PuzzleModel​(java.lang.String solution, java.lang.String name, int id)
      Constructor creates model data, parses solution data string into solution array sets hasSave to false
      PuzzleModel​(java.lang.String solution, java.lang.String save, java.lang.String name, int id)
      Constructor creates model data, parses solution data string into solution array and parses save string into saveData array, sets hasSave to true
